articles.description: After fans threw objects onto the field near the Padres’ Jurickson Profar during...
articles.content: In the wake of fans throwing objects onto the field during Friday nights game, the San Francisco Giants elevated their security and police presence in the seating areas around left field at Oracle Pa… [+2415 chars]
